## Connection Timeline

### Page Load Sequence

```
User navigates to page
        â”‚
        â–¼
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚   onMount()        â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
         â”‚
         â”œâ”€ Create lidarController
         â”‚  (visualization only, no connection)
         â”‚
         â”œâ”€ Get commandCenterClient
         â”‚  commandCenterManager.getClient(roverId)
         â”‚       â”‚
         â”‚       â”œâ”€ Check if client exists
         â”‚       â”œâ”€ If no: create new
         â”‚       â””â”€ If yes: reuse existing âœ…
         â”‚
         â”œâ”€ Connect to Command Center
         â”‚  commandCenterClient.connect()
         â”‚       â”‚
         â”‚       â”œâ”€ Open ROS WebSocket
         â”‚       â”‚       â”‚
         â”‚       â”‚       â”œâ”€ Subscribe to /scan
         â”‚       â”‚       â”œâ”€ Subscribe to /imu_raw
         â”‚       â”‚       â”œâ”€ Subscribe to /gps
         â”‚       â”‚       â””â”€ Subscribe to /obstacle_*
         â”‚       â”‚
         â”‚       â””â”€ Open WebRTC connection
         â”‚               â”‚
         â”‚               â”œâ”€ Open signaling WebSocket
         â”‚               â”œâ”€ Create RTCPeerConnection
         â”‚               â”œâ”€ Send offer
         â”‚               â”œâ”€ Receive answer
         â”‚               â””â”€ Receive video stream
         â”‚
         â”œâ”€ Subscribe to data
         â”‚  commandCenterClient.onLidarData(...)
         â”‚
         â””â”€ Bind video element
            commandCenterClient.setVideoElement('id')

Page is fully connected!
All data flows through Command Center

### Page Navigation

```
User clicks to different page
        â”‚
        â–¼
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚   onDestroy()      â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
         â”‚
         â”œâ”€ Clean up local state
         â”‚  lidarController = null
         â”‚
         â””â”€ Disconnect Command Center
            commandCenterClient.disconnect()
                    â”‚
                    â”œâ”€ Close ROS WebSocket
                    â”‚  (unsubscribe from all topics)
                    â”‚
                    â”œâ”€ Close WebRTC
                    â”‚  â”œâ”€ Close peer connection
                    â”‚  â””â”€ Close signaling socket
                    â”‚
                    â””â”€ Clear all data
                       (lidarData, imuData, etc.)

Clean disconnect, no leaks!


User navigates to another rover page
        â”‚
        â–¼
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”

â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
         â”‚
         â””â”€ Get commandCenterClient
            commandCenterManager.getClient(sameRoverId)
                    â”‚
                    â””â”€ Returns SAME client instance!
                       (reuses existing connection) âœ…

No reconnection needed!
Instant page load!

        â”‚
        â”œâ”€ Try ROS WebSocket
        â”‚       â”‚
        â”‚       âŒ onerror

        â”‚       â””â”€ reject(Error('Failed to connect'))
        â”‚
        â””â”€ catch block
                â”‚
                â”œâ”€ Show error to user
                â”œâ”€ connectionStatus = 'Failed'
                â””â”€ Allow retry


Scenario 2: WebRTC Fails (ROS OK)
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

        â”‚
        â”œâ”€ ROS WebSocket: âœ… OK
        â”‚
        â”œâ”€ Try WebRTC
        â”‚       â”‚
        â”‚       âŒ onerror
        â”‚       â”‚
        â”‚       â””â”€ log error (non-fatal)
        â”‚
        â””â”€ resolve() anyway
                â”‚
                â”œâ”€ Sensor data works âœ…
                â”œâ”€ Video doesn't work âŒ
                â””â”€ User still has functionality


Scenario 3: Page Closed During Connection
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

        â”‚
        â”œâ”€ Connection in progress...
        â”‚
User closes page
        â”‚
        â”œâ”€ onDestroy() called
        â”‚       â”‚
        â”‚       â””â”€ commandCenterClient.disconnect()
        â”‚               â”‚
        â”‚               â”œâ”€ Close WebSocket (if open)
        â”‚               â”œâ”€ Close WebRTC (if open)
        â”‚               â””â”€ Clear pending connections
        â”‚
        â””â”€ Clean shutdown, no leaks âœ…

â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
Active connection
        â”‚

        â”‚
        â”œâ”€ WebSocket.onclose
        â”‚       â”‚
        â”‚       â”œâ”€ Update isConnected = false
        â”‚       â””â”€ Notify state change
        â”‚
        â””â”€ UI shows "Disconnected"
                â”‚
                â””â”€ User can retry connection
